scripts.docker:build: pnpm run docker:stop && docker build -t project-a-app -f apps/project-a/Dockerfile . && docker build -t project-b-app -f apps/project-b/Dockerfile . && docker build -t nginx-app -f nginx/Dockerfile ./nginx
scripts.docker:start: docker network create app-network || true && docker run -d --name project-a --network app-network project-a-app && docker run -d --name project-b --network app-network project-b-app && docker run -d --name nginx --network app-network -p 3000:80 nginx-app
scripts.docker:stop: docker stop nginx project-a project-b || true && docker rm nginx project-a project-b || true && docker network rm app-network || true
scripts.docker:dev:start: docker network create app-network || true && docker run -d --name project-a --network app-network -p 5173:80 project-a-app && docker run -d --name project-b --network app-network -p 5174:80 project-b-app && docker run -d --name nginx --network app-network -p 3000:80 nginx-app
scripts.docker:dev:stop: docker stop nginx project-a project-b || true && docker rm nginx project-a project-b || true && docker network rm app-network || true
